titleStmt.title: Plantarum historiæ universalis Oxoniensis. Pars secunda seu herbarum distributio nova, per tabulas congnationis & affinitatis ex libro naturæ observata & detecta / authore Roberto Morison ...
titleStmt.author: Morison, Robert, 1620-1683.

biblFull.extent: 1 v. (various pagings, [132] leaves of plates) : ill.

notesStmt.note: Part I, on trees and shrubs, was never issued.
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
